title: 3.0.0.Alpha6 regression / tests via Gradle broken
body:
### Describe the bug

Error messages: `java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class io.quarkus.test.junit.IntegrationTestUtil` caused by `java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError: Exception java.util.ServiceConfigurationError: io.smallrye.config.SmallRyeConfigFactory: io.quarkus.runtime.configuration.QuarkusConfigFactory not a subtype`

Same works fine with 3.0.0a5 (and earlier)

Everything's on "latest version" (Gradle, Java 20, Linux)

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

All tests error out with this stack trace:

```
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class io.quarkus.test.junit.IntegrationTestUtil

	at org.junit.jupiter.engine.execution.InvocationInterceptorChain.chainAndInvoke(InvocationInterceptorChain.java:45)

	at io.quarkus.test.junit.QuarkusTestExtension.doJavaStart(QuarkusTestExtension.java:313)

	at java.base/java.util.ServiceLoader.fail(ServiceLoader.java:593)

```


### How to Reproduce?

Clone this branch https://github.com/snazy/nessie/tree/quarkus3
Run `./gradlew :nessie-quarkus:quarkusTest`


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Additional information
